alert.note: Alert for Hemphill; Lipscomb; Wheeler (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 25 at 10:27PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Wheeler, southeastern Lipscomb and Hemphill Counties through 1100 PM CDT... At 1026 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles northwest of Glazier to 8 miles south of Lake Marvin to 4 miles southeast of Briscoe. Movement was east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Canadian, Briscoe, Allison, Glazier and Lake Marvin. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
